titles.title: For as truly as I live,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For as truly as I live,
All the earth shall be filled
With the glory of the Lord,
For as truly as I live,
All the earth shall be filled
With the glory of the Lord,
The glory, the glory, the glory of the Lord.
For as truly as I live,
All the earth shall be filled
With the glory of the Lord.
